qas.question: How may adherents does Mahayana have?
How many adherents does Thervada have?
How many Buddists are outside of Asia?

context: According to a demographic analysis reported by Peter Harvey (2013): Mahayana has <a0_0>360 million<a0_0/> adherents; Theravada has <a1_0>150 million<a1_0/> adherents; and Vajrayana has 18,2 million adherents. <a2_0>Seven million<a2_0/> additional Buddhists are found outside of Asia.
